body.p: As the Content Author, to share your created tasks with Reviewers so that they can proofread, add comments, and make changes to the uploaded documents, follow this procedure:

ol.li: In the Content Fusion Tasks Manager view, right-click the particular task that you want to share and select Copy task link.
Open your email or whatever electronic messaging system your organization uses, paste the copied link, and send it to Reviewers that you want to look at the documents.

p.note: You can also retrieve the task link by clicking on the name of the particular task you want to share to open the task details in your default browser, then click the Share button to display a link to the task, then click the Copy button to copy the link to the system clipboard.
